name: metrics_tower
description: Metrics snapshot for the tower tile

vote_txn_invalid.description: Number of times we dropped a vote txn because it was invalid (malformed, bad signature, etc.)

vote_txn_ignored.description: Number of times we ignored all or part of a vote txn because we didn't recognize a slot (eg. our replay was behind)

vote_txn_mismatch.description: Number of times a vote txn mismatched our own block id

ancestor_rollback.description: Rollback to an ancestor of our prev vote (can't vote)

same_fork.description: Same fork as prev vote (can vote)

switch_pass.description: Prev vote was on a different fork, but we are allowed to switch (can vote)

switch_fail.description: Prev vote was on a different fork, and we are not allowed to switch (can't vote)

threshold_fail.description: Did not pass threshold check (can't vote)

propagated_fail.description: Prev leader block did not propagate (can't vote)

slot_ignored.description: Number of times we ignored a slot likely due to minority fork publish

hard_forks_seen.description: Number of hard forks we've seen (block ids with multiple candidate bank hashes)

hard_forks_pruned.description: Number of hard forks (candidate bank hashes) we've pruned

hard_forks_max_width.description: Max number of candidate bank hashes for a given block id
